title: Police thwart 'imminent' France attack
subtitle: Three men and girl of 16 are found with bomb-making materials in a police raid in Montpellier

title: US-Japan ties 'cornerstone of peace'
subtitle: After talks with PM Shinzo Abe, Donald Trump says the US is committed to 'the security of Japan'

title: NHS problems unacceptable, says Hunt
subtitle: Health Secretary Jeremy Hunt has conceded the NHS in England is facing 'completely unacceptable' problems.

title: Turkey denies Syria air strike 'mistake'
subtitle: Russia says its jets bombed coordinates provided by Turkey - a claim the Turkish military rejects

title: £50m of cocaine found on Norfolk beaches
subtitle: Cocaine with a street value of £50m has washed up on beaches in Norfolk.
author: BBC News
